page.title: 16The Jinney Ring Craft Centre
page.content: The Jinney Ring Craft Centre has been opened as to attract{tourism.}It has a series of workshops let to specialist{craftsmen,}a shop for gifts and a tearoom for refreshments. An extension is now being built to house a{restaurant.}This is an old barn which is being reconstructed on the site. The actual centre is a series of old{farm buildings}that have been renovated and adapted. It takes its name from a jinney ring which is on site along with other old farm implements and machines. Admission is free, though donations may be made towards the upkeep of the centre. It is opn from Thursday to Sunday, 10.30 a.m. to 5.30 p.m.
